name: Night|V|are VR
description:
WAKE UP!

Step into the mind of Lucas, a haunted man plagued by a twisted nightmare where he's relentlessly pursued by the distorted figure of a little girl.
Unravel the dark secret of his past and solve the sinister puzzles that threaten to keep him trapped in this hellish dream forever.

Can you outwit the demon of his mind and awaken from the nightmare
before it's too late?

VR GAME

This game is available for all SteamVR compatible headsets!
(e.g. Oculus Quest 2, Oculus Rift, etc.)

Controls:

in menu: 
select -> left/right Trigger (index button)

in game:
Walk -> use left thumbstick
Grab -> press left/right grip (middlefinger button)
SnapTurn -> use right thumbstick
